name: Conclave
task: jQuery plugins, responsive Bootsrap jade templates
description: This is a social network project for American schools and teachers.
Jade templates + SASS and LESS under NodeJS Express app.
The team consisted of me and NodeJS developer Alex.
We used oDesk and e-mail communication with Skype.

aboutProject: * [NodeJS with many modules such as Compass](http://nodejs.org)
aboutTeam: On this work i contacted with my main manager from **San Diego Calif.** The team consisted of me and NodeJS developer Alex. We worked in series: i received a design in **PSD format**, after i [programmed html/css with Webstorm tool](http://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm) and **LESS + SASS** under Compass compiler. We used [oDesk](https://www.odesk.com/o/profiles/users/_~01ffe04a2db9f8b16a) and e-mail communication with Skype.
myRole: This e-social network site based on NodeJS and Jade template engine also used SASS as main CSS preprocessor and i used my knowledge of LESS preprocessor also with Twitter Bootstrap as grid based CSS framework. When i worked with project's repo i used [GIT version control system](http://git-scm.com/about) and dedicated server on Linux. I programmed this project under my Mac with SSH port-forwarding techniques. I worked near 5 weeks with this project and developed Jade pages with many SASS code.
* Compass for SASS and JavaScript on server-side with jQuery on frontend
* LESS and SASS code with Bootstrap for all elements
result: After 5 weeks i completed project and main goal was **converting inline CSS styles to SASS** under Twitter Bootstrap and completing JavaScript code.
> I would like to keep working with her as much as possible for future projects too.

name: Premium Parts
description: Auto parts, accessories Django store. CSS3 & Bootstrap 3, HTML5 under Django templates.
Our team consisted of: I'm as Web-developer, 1 project manager, Web-designer and Python developer.

aboutTeam: It consisted of: i worked as Web-developer, 1 project manager, Web-designer and Python developer. I liked professionalism and good teamwork.
myRole: This e-commerce site based on Django and Scrapy, i used my knowledge of Django template system. When i worked with the team, i used my experience in usage of the [distributed version control system - Mercurial](http://mercurial.selenic.com). I worked 3 months under this project and coded main page for client area and administrative panel:
* Client Items Management in MySQL database | CRUD
result: We worked for three month. Work was hard, but we met the deadline.
Our customer appreciated result of our work by saying:>>
> Guys, i think users of my e-commerce site will be happy, so what is good for them is good for me. Good job!
>>During this time i grown professionally. I increased my knowledge and improved skills. I got a good experience and positive emotions, when i worked with them.

name: Imobo
description: This is site for buying and selling real estate.
CSS3 & Bootstrap 3, Jade templates.
The team: I'm as Web Developer, 1 project manager, 1 Javascript developer.
We used Odesk and e-mail communication, Skype.

aboutTeam: In this project i contacted with my main manager from **Brazil.**
^I [developed Jade (compiled into HTML) / LESS (compiled into CSS) with Jetbrains Webstorm tool.](http://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm)
myRole: This site based on NodeJS and Jade template engine, Twitter Bootstrap as a grid based CSS framework and LESS as main CSS preprocessor. I used [SourceTree](https://www.sourcetreeapp.com) for pushing and pulling code. I worked near 2 weeks with this project and developed many Jade pages with LESS code.
result: After 2 weeks i completed project and main goal was **coding Jade pages with LESS** under Twitter Bootstrap.
> Anya did a great job using bootstrap. I'll work with her again soon.

result: After 6 months i completed project and main goal was **developing design, coding Jade pages with LESS under Twitter Bootstrap, developing Django templates and Angular application.**
> I very liked what Anya have done!
